content:
CDHR Article 13: "The right to freedom of movement in search of knowledge and other social and cultural needs shall be guaranteed in accordance with the Islamic Shari'ah."

Comment: CDHR Article 13 does address the idea of freedom of movement, but it qualifies the right to freedom of movement in search of knowledge and other social and cultural needs in accordance with the Islamic Shari'ah. This differs from the UDHR Article 13, which emphasizes the right to freedom of movement and residence within the borders of each state, without any religious or cultural qualification.
